alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 24 at 3:32PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Southern California, including the following county, Riverside. * WHEN...Until 430 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water and minor debris over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 331 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Anza, Idyllwild-Pine Cove, Hwy 243 Between Banning And Idyllwild, Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, Mountain Center, Hwy 74 Between Anza And Palm Desert, Hwy 74 Between Hemet And Mountain Center, Lake Hemet, Cahuilla Indian Reservation and Santa Rosa Mountain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
